author: PlatformIO
text:
Atmel SAM dev-platform v4.4 is out!
New boards, updated Seeed, Adafruit, and SparkFun #Arduino cores, other improvements
community.platformio.org/t/atmel-sam-de…

author: JetBrains CLion IDE
text: CLion 2020.1.2 Bug-fix Update is now available. It brings several performance improvements, more accurate [[maybe_unused]] quick-fix, fixes for CUDA, and updated @PlatformIO_Org plugin. Update and let us know your feedback! blog.jetbrains.com/clion/2020/06/…
